text: Aayirathil Oruvan () is a 2009 Malayalam drama film directed by Sibi Malayil, starring Kalabhavan Mani in the lead role.G. Jayakumar (6 March 2011). "Story- line captures the mood of the film". The Hindu. Retrieved 27 June 2013. ==Plot== Aravindan (Kalabhavan Mani) is an ever sacrificing brother who gets himself into a financial mess, following the marriage of his younger sister. As he strives hard to pay off the debt, he ends up borrowing even more and starts his slow and tragic descent into an abyss of no return. ==Cast== *Kalabhavan Mani as Aravindan *Sujitha as Saraswathi *K.
